dict.string:
Ingredients:
1. 1 large ripe avocado, 1 lime, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 red onion 2. 2 medium sweet potatoes , 2 large eggs, sriracha , for drizzling
Recipe:
1. Smash up the avocado with a fork, then add the lime juice and season to taste. 2. Heat the oil in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Add the onion and cook for 2 mins 3. then stir in the sweet potato. Season and press the potato into the pan with the back of a wooden spoon. Cook for 10-15 mins, until golden. 4. Make two spaces in the pan, crack in the eggs and cook for 2-3 mins until the whites are just set and the yolks runny. Add the avocado and drizzle with sriracha to serve.

Ingredients:
1. Â½ cucumber, 60g feta, 200g tub marinated olives with sundried tomato 2. 250g pack courgetti
Recipes:
1. Slice the cucumber on the diagonal and crumble the feta. 2. Combine all the ingredients in a bowl with a little extra virgin olive oil and some seasoning, then serve.
